frame.name: Friction
frame.definition:
<def-root> A <fen>Theme</fen> moves on or against the surface of a <fen>Static_object</fen>. (Alternatively, <fen>Themes</fen> moves against each other simultaneously). The <fen>Theme</fen> exerts pressure on the surface and experiences resistance to its movement.
<ex><fex name="Theme">Smithers' boots</fex> <t>scraped</t> <fex name="Static_object">on the floor</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Theme
FE.definition:
<def-root>The physical entity which moves over the suface of the <fen>Static_object</fen>
<ex><fex name="Theme">His backpack</fex> <t>grated</t> against the wall</ex>.</def-root>

FE.name: Static_object
FE.definition:
<def-root>A non-moving physical object over a surface of which the <fen>Theme</fen> moves.
<ex> The spout <t>grates</t> <fex name="Static_object">against the tap</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Themes
FE.definition:
<def-root>Two moving entities whose surfaces move against each other.
<ex>He felt <fex name="Themes">his teeth</fex> <t>scrape</t> against the plaster </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The way in which the <fen>Theme</fen> moves against the <fen>Static_object</fen>
<ex>is steel helmet <t>grated</t> <fex name="Manner">gently</fex> against the top of the door</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The setting in which the motion of the <fen>Theme</fen> happens
<ex><fex name="Place">In the hallway</fex> a key <t>grated</t> in the lock</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of friction produced in the <fen>Theme</fen>'s motion.
<ex>The steel helment <t>grated</t> <fex name="Degree">faintly</fex> against the top of the </ex></def-root>
